title: 我的世界 加载mod时崩溃
author: NO烈阳
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Twilight_Two 于 2020-3-24 17:01 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
 
WARNING: coremods are present:
  LesslagCorePlugin ([较少的滞后]lesslag-1.0-1.12.2.jar)
  SSLoadingPlugin (SereneSeasons-1.12.2-1.2.18-universal.jar)
  DLFMLCorePlugin ([动态光源]DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin (Forgelin-1.8.4.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.10.3-1.12.2.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin ([1.12.2][更快的加载]MakeZoomZoom-0.0.1.jar)
  MicdoodlePlugin (MicdoodleCore-1.12.2-4.0.2.244.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.8.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Why did you do that?

Time: 3/24/20 3:12 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from The Heartwork (heartwork)
